author: Mark Reilly
title: Hallmark executive will be Sun Country's new CEO
text:
Hallmark executive will be Sun Country's new CEO Aug 17, 2015, 6:55am CDT Industries & Tags Mark Reilly Managing Editor Minneapolis / St. Paul Business Journal Mark Reilly Managing Editor Minneapolis / St. Paul Business Journal Related Content Nancy Kuehn | MSPBJ Outgoing CEO John Frederickson will stay Sun Country to handle negotiations with pilots. Sun Country Airlines has named Zarir Erani , currently an technology executive with a business-to-business division of Hallmark, as its next CEO. The Star Tribune reports on the hire , which was announced Friday. Erani replaces John Fredericksen , who took the job in 2013 and will stay on to handle the Mendota Heights-based company's contract talks with its pilots. (Those negotiations have been rocky this year, with pilots threatening a strike and the Davis family, which owns Sun Country, hinting at staff cuts or an outright shutdown .) Erani is currently chief information officer at Hallmark Business Connections, which develops employee-recognition incentives and wellness programs.
